name: Word
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Text
Word
description:
Word

A word within a detected text (OCR). See Text#words.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/text.png"
text = image.text

words = text.words
words.count #=> 28

word = words.first
word.text #=> "Google"
word.bounds.count #=> 4
vertex = word.bounds.first
vertex.x #=> 13
vertex.y #=> 8

methods.name: bounds
